title: Music Samurai v1.1
description:
Highly addictive music action game within Samurai style.
Inspired by such TV series as "Afro Samurai" "Samurai Champloo" and other modern pearls - Music Samurai blends ancient Asian Katana by adding western sharpening to it.

Adventure you haven't seen! Story in Comics.
Our angry hero got in trouble when his bowl of rice was eaten by wicked chubby samurai. Main character is going through personal dilemma of getting revenge and a need to eat. And all of this while running through vibrant villages 
and towns.

Two modes:

Story - unlock levels and follow the path of the samurai. 
Infinite - choose any unlocked level and try running as long as you can.

New type of rhythm game.
Weekly rankings.

Golden dragon to let you easily fill up your score.
...all of this wrapped in good music.
And just so you know, keep your hands off his rice, otherwise you'll be in trouble.

More info:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.pixelpunch.musicsamurai" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
